channel.title: Fonts problem
channel.description:
steam-version of game not correctly displayed interface menu and subtitles, when I use russian version of steam interface this is looks like, as I screen here [url]https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/36370717983727916/B06CFF4FBD031F9CDE5FC618168495F1F486BBA8/[/url]
problem fixed, when I changed steam language, but this is not good version of solution by the way -language english in game start properties not helped

item.title: Fonts problem
item.dc:creator: Adam-Bomb
item.description:
Did that other thread fix it? I am told you can also set your Steam language to English. We are looking into this for a permanent fix.

https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=8487-WSCN-4121

Read full topic

item.title: Fonts problem
item.dc:creator: Hubicorn
item.description:
Hopefully this thread can offer you some help -> Steam release fun

Read full topic

item.title: Fonts problem
item.dc:creator: Siberian
item.description:
steam-version of game not correctly displayed interface menu and subtitles, when I use russian version of steam interface
this is looks like, as I screen here https://images.akamai.steamusercontent.com/ugc/36370717983727916/B06CFF4FBD031F9CDE5FC618168495F1F486BBA8/

problem fixed, when I changed steam language, but this is not good version of solution
by the way -language english in game start properties not helped
